marker.ph: <<TabControl ItemsSource="{Binding InventoryAreaCollectionView}" ikriv:TabContent.IsCached="True"> <ikriv:TabContent.Template> <DataTemplate> <local:InventoryContentsView/> </DataTemplate> </ikriv:TabContent.Template> </TabControl>.../>
<<ikriv:TabContent.Template> <DataTemplate> <local:InventoryContentsView/> </DataTemplate> </ikriv:TabContent.Template>.../>
<<DataTemplate> <local:InventoryContentsView/> </DataTemplate>.../>
/* TabContent.cs, version 1.2 ... */
/// Attached properties for persistent tab control ...
/// Controls whether tab content is cached or not ...
/// Used instead of TabControl.ContentTemplate for cached tabs ...
/// Used instead of TabControl.ContentTemplateSelector for cached tabs ...
/* Content manager already exists for the tab control. This means that tab content template is applied ... */
<<Grid> <ContentControl Name="InventoryAreas" Grid.Column="0"> <local:InventoryAreas/> </ContentControl> </Grid>.../>
<<ContentControl Name="InventoryAreas" Grid.Column="0"> <local:InventoryAreas/> </ContentControl>.../>

<<Grid> <ListBox Name="ListBox" > <Label Name="ChecksumLabel" Content="{Binding Checksum}"/> <Label Name="GeneratedChecksumLabel" Content="{Binding OnFileChecksum}"/> <Label Name="SteamIdLabel" Content="{Binding SteamId}" MouseDoubleClick="EditSteamLabel"/> <Label Name="SizeLabel" Content="{Binding Size}"/> <Label Name="FilePathLabel" Content="{Binding FilePath}"/> </ListBox> </Grid>.../>

<<ListBox Name="ListBox" > <Label Name="ChecksumLabel" Content="{Binding Checksum}"/> <Label Name="GeneratedChecksumLabel" Content="{Binding OnFileChecksum}"/> <Label Name="SteamIdLabel" Content="{Binding SteamId}" MouseDoubleClick="EditSteamLabel"/> <Label Name="SizeLabel" Content="{Binding Size}"/> <Label Name="FilePathLabel" Content="{Binding FilePath}"/> </ListBox>.../>

<<Label Name="ChecksumLabel" Content="{Binding Checksum}"/> <Label Name="GeneratedChecksumLabel" Content="{Binding OnFileChecksum}"/> <Label Name="SteamIdLabel" Content="{Binding SteamId}" MouseDoubleClick="EditSteamLabel"/> <Label Name="SizeLabel" Content="{Binding Size}"/> <Label Name="FilePathLabel" Content="{Binding FilePath}"/>.../>

<<DockPanel Name="Root" xmlns:local="clr-namespace:MHW_Save_Editor"> <Menu Width="Auto" Height="20" DockPanel.Dock="Top"> <MenuItem Header="File"> <MenuItem Header="Open" Click="OpenFunction" /> <MenuItem Header="Save" Click="SaveFunction" /> <MenuItem Header="Backup" Click="BackupFunction" /> <MenuItem Header="Restore" Click="RestoreFunction" /> </MenuItem> <MenuItem Header="Edit" ItemsSource = "{Binding EditOptions}" Click = "EditMenuItem_Click"/> <MenuItem Header="Tools" ItemsSource = "{Binding ToolsOptions}" Click = "ToolsMenuItem_Click"/> </Menu> <Grid> <TabControl Name = "TabControl" SelectionChanged = "TabControl_SelectionChanged"> <TabItem Header="General"> <local:GeneralTab x:Name="GeneralTabControl" SteamLabelDoubleClicked="EditSteamLabel"/> </TabItem> <!-- Investigations ================================================================================--> <TabItem Header="Investigations"> <Grid> <ContentControl Name="InvestigationsTabControl"/> </Grid> </TabItem> <!-- Inventory ================================================================================--> <TabItem Header="Inventory"> <Grid> <ContentControl Name="InventoryTabControl"/> </Grid> </TabItem> </TabControl> </Grid> </DockPanel>.../>

<<Menu Width="Auto" Height="20" DockPanel.Dock="Top"> <MenuItem Header="File"> <MenuItem Header="Open" Click="OpenFunction" /> <MenuItem Header="Save" Click="SaveFunction" /> <MenuItem Header="Backup" Click="BackupFunction" /> <MenuItem Header="Restore" Click="RestoreFunction" /> </MenuItem> <MenuItem Header="Edit" ItemsSource = "{Binding EditOptions}" Click = "EditMenuItem_Click"/> <MenuItem Header="Tools" ItemsSource = "{Binding ToolsOptions}" Click = "ToolsMenuItem_Click"/> </Menu> <Grid> <TabControl Name = "TabControl" SelectionChanged = "TabControl_SelectionChanged"> <TabItem Header="General"> <local:GeneralTab x:Name="GeneralTabControl" SteamLabelDoubleClicked="EditSteamLabel"/> </TabItem> <!-- Investigations ================================================================================--> <TabItem Header="Investigations"> <Grid> <ContentControl Name="InvestigationsTabControl"/> </Grid> </TabItem> <!-- Inventory ================================================================================--> <TabItem Header="Inventory"> <Grid> <ContentControl Name="InventoryTabControl"/> </Grid> </TabItem> </TabControl> </Grid>.../>

<<MenuItem Header="Open" Click="OpenFunction" /> <MenuItem Header="Save" Click="SaveFunction" /> <MenuItem Header="Backup" Click="BackupFunction" /> <MenuItem Header="Restore" Click="RestoreFunction" />.../>

<<Grid> <Grid.Resources> <DataTemplate x:Key="SlotDataTemplate"> <!-- How to display each "inventory slot of the collection" --> <local:SlotView Height = "54" Width = "110"/> </DataTemplate> <ItemsPanelTemplate x:Key="WrapPanel"> <WrapPanel/> </ItemsPanelTemplate> </Grid.Resources> <ScrollViewer VerticalScrollBarVisibility="Auto" HorizontalScrollBarVisibility="Disabled" > <ItemsControl ItemsSource="{Binding SlotList}" ItemTemplate = "{StaticResource SlotDataTemplate}" ItemsPanel = "{StaticResource WrapPanel}" > </ItemsControl> </ScrollViewer> </Grid>.../>

<<Grid.Resources> <DataTemplate x:Key="SlotDataTemplate"> <!-- How to display each "inventory slot of the collection" --> <local:SlotView Height = "54" Width = "110"/> </DataTemplate> <ItemsPanelTemplate x:Key="WrapPanel"> <WrapPanel/> </ItemsPanelTemplate> </Grid.Resources> <ScrollViewer VerticalScrollBarVisibility="Auto" HorizontalScrollBarVisibility="Disabled" > <ItemsControl ItemsSource="{Binding SlotList}" ItemTemplate = "{StaticResource SlotDataTemplate}" ItemsPanel = "{StaticResource WrapPanel}" > </ItemsControl> </ScrollViewer>.../>

<<DataTemplate x:Key="SlotDataTemplate"> <!-- How to display each "inventory slot of the collection" --> <local:SlotView Height = "54" Width = "110"/> </DataTemplate> <ItemsPanelTemplate x:Key="WrapPanel"> <WrapPanel/> </ItemsPanelTemplate>.../>
<<local:SlotView Height = "54" Width = "110"/>.../>
<<ItemsControl ItemsSource="{Binding SlotList}" ItemTemplate = "{StaticResource SlotDataTemplate}" ItemsPanel = "{StaticResource WrapPanel}" > </ItemsControl>.../>

<<Grid> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <!-- Box Contents --> <RowDefinition Height="4*" /> <!-- Item Description > <RowDefinition Height="1*" /--> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <ContentControl Grid.Row="0"> <local:InventoryContentsView/> </ContentControl> <!--ContentControl Name="ItemContents" Grid.Row="1"> <local:ItemDescriptionView/> </ContentControl--> </Grid>.../>

<<Grid.RowDefinitions> <!-- Box Contents --> <RowDefinition Height="4*" /> <!-- Item Description > <RowDefinition Height="1*" /--> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <ContentControl Grid.Row="0"> <local:InventoryContentsView/> </ContentControl>.../>
<<RowDefinition Height="4*" />.../>

property.name: SearchEverywhereHistoryKey
property.value: InvestigationCollectionView null null nullinvestigation null null nullinvesit null null Extensibility null null ResourceDictionary.xaml FILE file://G:/Users/AsteriskAmpersand/RiderProjects/MHW/MHW Save Editor/src/Resources/ResourcesDictionary.xaml new Investigation(InvestigationThinlayer null null ViewModelLocator null null Currentinvestigation null null BoxstoreCollection null null BoxstoreCollectionView null null

task.summary: Default task
-Fixed checksum algorithm, it works correctly now. -Fixed encryption algorithm, it works correctly now. -Modified GUI in preparation for added editors.
Investigations tab now displays investigation list and controls.
Investigations tab is now element complete. Removed Business logic out of editor, will replace it for a warning of illegality until I learn to data bind as wpf wants things to be data binded.
Fixed Checksum Issues when saving.

Complete Refactoring -Investigation Completely Redone to be a thin layer over hex. -Investigation View Model now properly acts as a View Model for Investigation. -Rewrote the backup function to just use the operating system. -Fixed yet another checksum issue introduced by endianess.
Heavy UI Changes, UI functionality for investigations has been temporarily removed.
Heavy UI Changes, UI functionality for investigations has been temporarily removed.
UI Complete Refactorization. Investigations tab still in progress but save, open, edit steamId and backup work.
Forgot a file
Reached 0.1 features (gained data grid though it can be replaced with a list if performance continues to be an issue) but with a codebase that makes sense and proper classing and user controls.
Fixed resources hard coded path.
Fixes #3 Fixes #4
README Update
README Update
Fixed Unencrypted save not working properly.
Filter now works (without error handling).
Sorting now works.
Sorting refined into a more user friendly UX.
Sorting and Filtering now handle errors properly and simply display an error message and continues.
Autocommit added.
Fixed Edit and Tools in Investigation crashing when no investigation was selected.
Fixed Pasting without clipboard full.
Bounds Checking for Paste and Import at are now checked. Paste will no longer crash when done without a clipboard.
Git cleaning
Git cleaning
Added icon to the application.
Reduced memory leak due to dialog boxes. Changed text boxes to text blocks where possible to reduce memory leaks from cache.
Limited size of text inputs to further cut down on memory leakage.

Clearing an investigation no longer uses the default null investigation but a copy of it. Investigation initialization is now done with a copy of the provided array instead of the array reference itself.
Reimplemented the default sorting algorithm for investigations from n2 to n.
Prevented the DataGrid from allowing users to use it's sort function which breaks investigation back end.
Fixed Investigation title not updating.
More kiddie proofing. Datagrid no longer allows row deletion.
UI Skelleton for Inventory
Almost complete backend of Inventory Editing.
Got Inventory Areas to show up.
Working Inventory Editing (only images are missing).
Working Inventory Editing with icons and softcoded paths.
Investigation Editor now has icons as well, Y0 has been capped.
Investigation editor now predicts number of boxes with icons.
Tempered Icons added.
Fixed crash when illegal items are placed on the wrong box. It will now delete them.

MESSAGE.value: Sorting now works.
Sorting refined into a more user friendly UX.
Sorting and Filtering now handle errors properly and simply display an error message and continues.
Autocommit added.
Fixed Edit and Tools in Investigation crashing when no investigation was selected.
Fixed Pasting without clipboard full.
Bounds Checking for Paste and Import at are now checked. Paste will no longer crash when done without a clipboard.
Git cleaning
Added icon to the application.
Reduced memory leak due to dialog boxes. Changed text boxes to text blocks where possible to reduce memory leaks from cache.
Limited size of text inputs to further cut down on memory leakage.

Clearing an investigation no longer uses the default null investigation but a copy of it. Investigation initialization is now done with a copy of the provided array instead of the array reference itself.
Reimplemented the default sorting algorithm for investigations from n2 to n.
Prevented the DataGrid from allowing users to use it's sort function which breaks investigation back end.
Fixed Investigation title not updating.
More kiddie proofing. Datagrid no longer allows row deletion.
UI Skelleton for Inventory
Almost complete backend of Inventory Editing.
Got Inventory Areas to show up.
Working Inventory Editing (only images are missing).
Working Inventory Editing with icons and softcoded paths.
Investigation Editor now has icons as well, Y0 has been capped.
Investigation editor now predicts number of boxes with icons.
Tempered Icons added.
Fixed crash when illegal items are placed on the wrong box. It will now delete them.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Fixed crash when illegal items are placed on the wrong box. It will now delete them.

<<Grid> <ListBox Name="ListBox" > <Label Name="ChecksumLabel" Content="{Binding Checksum}"/> <Label Name="GeneratedChecksumLabel" Content="{Binding OnFileChecksum}"/> <Label Name="SteamIdLabel" Content="{Binding SteamId}" MouseDoubleClick="EditSteamLabel"/> <Label Name="SizeLabel" Content="{Binding Size}"/> <Label Name="FilePathLabel" Content="{Binding FilePath}"/> </ListBox> </Grid>.../>

<<ListBox Name="ListBox" > <Label Name="ChecksumLabel" Content="{Binding Checksum}"/> <Label Name="GeneratedChecksumLabel" Content="{Binding OnFileChecksum}"/> <Label Name="SteamIdLabel" Content="{Binding SteamId}" MouseDoubleClick="EditSteamLabel"/> <Label Name="SizeLabel" Content="{Binding Size}"/> <Label Name="FilePathLabel" Content="{Binding FilePath}"/> </ListBox>.../>

<<Label Name="ChecksumLabel" Content="{Binding Checksum}"/> <Label Name="GeneratedChecksumLabel" Content="{Binding OnFileChecksum}"/> <Label Name="SteamIdLabel" Content="{Binding SteamId}" MouseDoubleClick="EditSteamLabel"/> <Label Name="SizeLabel" Content="{Binding Size}"/> <Label Name="FilePathLabel" Content="{Binding FilePath}"/>.../>
/* TabContent.cs, version 1.2 ... */
/// Attached properties for persistent tab control ...
/// Controls whether tab content is cached or not ...
/// Used instead of TabControl.ContentTemplate for cached tabs ...
/// Used instead of TabControl.ContentTemplateSelector for cached tabs ...
/* Content manager already exists for the tab control. This means that tab content template is applied ... */
<<Grid> <ContentControl Name="InventoryAreas" Grid.Column="0"> <local:InventoryAreas/> </ContentControl> </Grid>.../>
<<ContentControl Name="InventoryAreas" Grid.Column="0"> <local:InventoryAreas/> </ContentControl>.../>

<<Grid> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <!-- Box Contents --> <RowDefinition Height="4*" /> <!-- Item Description > <RowDefinition Height="1*" /--> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <ContentControl Grid.Row="0"> <local:InventoryContentsView/> </ContentControl> <!--ContentControl Name="ItemContents" Grid.Row="1"> <local:ItemDescriptionView/> </ContentControl--> </Grid>.../>

<<Grid.RowDefinitions> <!-- Box Contents --> <RowDefinition Height="4*" /> <!-- Item Description > <RowDefinition Height="1*" /--> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <ContentControl Grid.Row="0"> <local:InventoryContentsView/> </ContentControl>.../>
<<RowDefinition Height="4*" />.../>

<<Grid> <Grid.Resources> <DataTemplate x:Key="SlotDataTemplate"> <!-- How to display each "inventory slot of the collection" --> <local:SlotView Height = "54" Width = "110"/> </DataTemplate> <ItemsPanelTemplate x:Key="WrapPanel"> <WrapPanel/> </ItemsPanelTemplate> </Grid.Resources> <ScrollViewer VerticalScrollBarVisibility="Auto" HorizontalScrollBarVisibility="Disabled" > <ItemsControl ItemsSource="{Binding SlotList}" ItemTemplate = "{StaticResource SlotDataTemplate}" ItemsPanel = "{StaticResource WrapPanel}" > </ItemsControl> </ScrollViewer> </Grid>.../>

<<Grid.Resources> <DataTemplate x:Key="SlotDataTemplate"> <!-- How to display each "inventory slot of the collection" --> <local:SlotView Height = "54" Width = "110"/> </DataTemplate> <ItemsPanelTemplate x:Key="WrapPanel"> <WrapPanel/> </ItemsPanelTemplate> </Grid.Resources> <ScrollViewer VerticalScrollBarVisibility="Auto" HorizontalScrollBarVisibility="Disabled" > <ItemsControl ItemsSource="{Binding SlotList}" ItemTemplate = "{StaticResource SlotDataTemplate}" ItemsPanel = "{StaticResource WrapPanel}" > </ItemsControl> </ScrollViewer>.../>

<<DataTemplate x:Key="SlotDataTemplate"> <!-- How to display each "inventory slot of the collection" --> <local:SlotView Height = "54" Width = "110"/> </DataTemplate> <ItemsPanelTemplate x:Key="WrapPanel"> <WrapPanel/> </ItemsPanelTemplate>.../>
<<local:SlotView Height = "54" Width = "110"/>.../>
<<ItemsControl ItemsSource="{Binding SlotList}" ItemTemplate = "{StaticResource SlotDataTemplate}" ItemsPanel = "{StaticResource WrapPanel}" > </ItemsControl>.../>

<<TabControl ItemsSource="{Binding InventoryAreaCollectionView}" ikriv:TabContent.IsCached="True"> <ikriv:TabContent.Template> <DataTemplate> <local:InventoryContentsView/> </DataTemplate> </ikriv:TabContent.Template> </TabControl>.../>
<<ikriv:TabContent.Template> <DataTemplate> <local:InventoryContentsView/> </DataTemplate> </ikriv:TabContent.Template>.../>
<<DataTemplate> <local:InventoryContentsView/> </DataTemplate>.../>
